pages.text: A ribbon, gifted to pets as an everlasting promise to watch out and care for them.$(br)Name it, add Pigment to it in a Crafting Table and attach it on a creature.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Your pet receive its new, colored name, will immediately trust you if it does not already and - should it ever die - drop a $(item)Broken Promise$().
